content: **drops crochet wrist warmers in karisma superwash yarn alternative merino ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **size** one size **materials** drops karisma superwash from garnstudio 50 g color no 21 gray 50 g color no 44 light gray 50 g color no 54 beige/brown 50 g color no 55 light beige/brown drops crochet hook size 4 5 mm - or size needed to get 18 treble_crochet = width 10 cm 4
